channel.description: Recent content in Jaws the Exhibition on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Steven Spielberg Praises ‘Jaws’ at Academy Museum Exhibit: It ‘Cost Me a Pound of Flesh, but Gave Me a Ton of Career’
item.description: Steven Spielberg took the stage at the Academy Museum of Motion Pictures in Los Angeles on Wednesday to introduce “Jaws: The Exhibition”: the largest exhibit to ever dive deep on the block
